name: Samsh Bones
description:
This is a short game where you can play with your friends and shoot each others to win.

To do so, one player needs to create a game while the others need to join thanks to the lobby code.

Then, choose one of the available character (zombie, ghost, demon or skeleton) and have fun!

q or d : left or right
spacebar : jump
left click : shoot

Submitted to https://itch.io/jam/game-jam-1-gaming-campus

Created by :
